lines.text: You are SUCH an asshole.
Yes I am. I'm an asshole... with an Uzi.
When a man's jawbone drops off it's time to reassess the situation.

[after having sex with a mummy]
I like it when they lie still like that.
Tell me, why is it that you can see Ray and I can't?
I was in an accident. A car accident... about five years ago .I don't know they say that sometimes when you have a traumatic experience that it can alter your perception.
Get back in the goddamn ground you unorganized grab-asstic gob of teleplasmic shit!
What in the hell are you doing in my graveyard? You have been told to stay away! Sound off like you've got a pair!
Yeah, well, Cemetary is a public place, Hiles.
I do not like you! You cannot bring your spooks here without my permission! Disappear, scumbag!
Catch you later, Hiles.
Hey, my tour of duty runs another 85 years! There's a piece of dirt up here with your name on it, Bannister! I'm waiting for you, you little maggot!
You know if I wanted to get shot at everyday, I'd move my black ass to Los Angeles!
[about to have sex with a mummy]
There's a reason they call me the "hanging judge".
[last lines]
Boy that Dammers guy, he sure looks pissed.

[without realizing]
Yeah.
[the penny suddenly drops and Frank looks back in surprise at Lucy]
Well sometimes Frank, you see when you go through a traumatic experience, it kind of alters your perception.

[Johnny, violently upset, interrupting his girlfriend, counterpart of this serial-killer couple]
Shut up! That Russian cannibal creep is telling everyone he did 50 plus. That reflects badly on both of us, Patty. This record should be held by an American.
I'm in the mood for a little vivisection.
Johnny Bartlett. I thought guys like you fried in Hell.
I got out Frank. I've been carrying on the good work. Got me a score of forty.
I am not one of your shitty little emanations, Bannister!
Patronising do-gooder bitch!
Oh Patricia, you kill her, I'll watch.
We have a body count of... twenty eight. You're a very dangerous man, Mr. Bannister.
For Christ's sake, you're not seriously suggesting that Frank is responsible for...
You're way out of your depth here, Sheriff Perry. Please leave.
Frank Bannister is my prisoner.
By the power invested in me by the president of the United States, I am telling you to get the hell out of this room.
My body is a roadmap of pain. And pain has its valves
Sheriff! You are violating my territorial bubble.
[an Elvis statuette flies around the room during a Poltergeist appearance]
He's alive!
Give it up, Frank! Death ain't no way to make a living!

[to Stuart and Cyrus]
Why is it that flies stick to you guys like shit to a blanket?

Ha ha, very funny. You're a funny guy, Frank. You know, all you think about is yourself. I could complain, too, you know. I would like some new clothes. You get to dress nice. Here I am still looking like Linc from The Mod Squad.
You died in the 70's. It's a bummer.
Ah, the old express train to Hell. No lines, no waiting!

[after seeing the glowing number on her forehead]
You're next.
Are you threatening me?

[Frank has smashed one of his lawn gnomes]
No! Not Budzo! My Budzo! My Budzo! I've got your license plate number, you bastard!

[accusing Frank of killing]
But what about the guy in the toilet? What did *he* do? Piss on your Hush Puppies?
Frank, Frank!
C'mon Lucy, 10cc Lidocaine, Quick now.
LUCY! I CAN NOT GET HIM!
WHO? WHO can't you get, Frank?
JOHNNY BARTLETT! HE'S BACK!
WHAT?
And Lucy, He's killing again!
PATRICIA!

[leans towards Lucy]
LUCY! YOU HAVE... HAVE TO... TAKE HER OUT... TAKE HER OUT OF THE HOUSE! GO ! GO!
Lucy, just go now!
The wicked will be punished.
Alright, Bannister. Can you at least give me a ride so I don't miss my funeral.
Come on. You're out of your mind. You're talking about a mythical figure. A pseudo-religious icon from the 12th century.

Save your pea brain prattle for the classroom,boy. That was the soul collector and he's been taking people out since time began. He's been going about some dark business here in Fairwater and we ain't nothing but worm bait. When your number's up, that's it.
I'm just trying to make a living.
Living? Not a word you'd know a lot about. Is it Mr. Bannister?

Got a kiss for Honey Bunny? I know, I know it's the way I look. It's this damn ectoplasm stuff. It turns you off,doesn't it? Come on Lucy you're not listening to me.Look,baby I know we have a great relationship. It's just that lately I don't feel you've been giving hundred percent.
Ho-lee Jesus! Frank Bannister!
Frank! Frank! Are you okay? What happened?
[Ordering arrest of Frank Bannister]
What do you do? Are you arresting him?
Please leave, Mrs Lynskey!
Home, Lucy.

[Go towards Frank Bannister]
Frank, you need a lawyer! Wait!
Home, Lucy.
But you haven't done anything!
[Towards polizei]
He hasn't done anything!
How could you know? Do you know me? Am I nice guy, Lucy?
That cozy scene of the Cuisine restaurant, EXCALIBUR, is a bullshit.
I was just doing my job.
[Think for a while]
I don't give a damn about you, I don't give a damn about anybody!
And what the hell are you saying?
Just go home...
[began to cry & left]
Lucy , are you okay to drive?
YEAH!
[SIGN]
The chicken was not scary, Stuart. The chicken was stupid.
Oh, I've got the shakes now. I need some vitamin B.
You can't take vitamins anymore. You don't eat. You don't drink. You don't go to the bathroom. All that shit's over with.
What's happening in the cell? I felt something crushin my heart!
I cannot fight it Luce, I cannot protect you! So only one way to be with extinct. I can have an out-of-body-experiment.
What?
and I can have RIGHT NOW!
No, No!
Go along Lucy, swap in the WAY!
WAIT! WAIT!
